availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Absalom Low (Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. North Carolina native. Married Marthena Low. Father of Nancy Low, Lucy Low, Martha "Patsey" Low, and Sarah Low. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Merchant in Muhlenberg County in 1860. Justice of the peace for Muhlenberg County in 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 219; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 2, p. 21; KYR-0001-029-0506.
